name: Luke Rall
shortBio: Visionary designer with a passion for creating memorable gaming experiences
longBio: Luke brings creative vision and strategic thinking to Atlas Games. With a background in game design and production, he ensures every project meets our high standards for quality and player engagement. His attention to detail and player-first approach drives the creative direction of our studio.
quote: Great games aren't just played, they're experienced and remembered.

name: Liam Schultz
shortBio: Technical mastermind who brings game ideas to life through code
longBio: Liam is the technical backbone of Atlas Games, with expertise spanning multiple programming languages and game engines. His innovative problem-solving skills and dedication to clean, efficient code ensure our games run smoothly across all platforms. He's passionate about pushing technical boundaries while maintaining accessibility.
quote: Code is poetry, and games are the stage where that poetry comes to life.

name: Keagan Du Plessis
shortBio: Creative artist who brings visual magic to every Atlas Games project
longBio: Keagan's artistic vision defines the visual identity of Atlas Games. With expertise in both traditional and digital art, he creates compelling characters, environments, and animations that captivate players. His understanding of visual storytelling and attention to aesthetic detail elevate every project he touches.
quote: Every pixel tells a story, and every animation brings that story to life.
